titles.title: For the relief of Zhuljeta Zhegra.
For the relief of Zhuljeta Zhegra.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Makes Zhuljeta Zhegra eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident of the United States under the Immigration and Nationality Act, upon payment of the required visa fees.
